story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_0200_10:
So this is what a battle between the best
sync pairs is like!
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: Ahaha! Thanks for cheering us on, you two!
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: Sorry for taking up your time like this, Leon.
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Not a problem, mate! I wanted to battle
you, too!
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Plus, you trained with me when I
participated in the Arceus Cup.
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_0700_10: This is the least I can do to repay you!
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: I know, Charizard. I appreciate you, too!
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_1000_10:
You and Charizard are even stronger than
the last time we battled!
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_1100_10: Is it because of your arc suit?
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I wonder... I’m actually not sure how
it works.
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_1300_10:
But that day at the Arceus Cup, I felt my
bond with Charizard surpass anything we
ever felt before.
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Ever since, we’ve been able to awaken our
arc suit, and when we do, we can bring out
100% of our sync stone ultimate’s power.
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Then it all comes down to having a strong
bond with one of your partners, huh.
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_1800_10: We came to help with your training!
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_2000_10: Never thought Silver’d come to help me out!
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Hmph. I’m only here ’cause Ethan dragged
me into this.
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_2200_10: But I also had something to say.
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_2400_10: Don’t you dare lose to Giovanni.
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_2500_10:
We can’t let him get away with doing
whatever he wants.
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_2600_10:
I’ll take that as words of encouragement,
then!
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_2700_10: Good luck at the Arceus Cup!
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_2800_10:
I think it’s wrong how Team Rocket’s trying
to force out the power of their sync stones
ultimate!
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_2900_10:
Yeah. Show them the right way to prove
your bond!
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_3100_10: Everyone else is cheering for you too, Blue!
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_3200_10:
We’re gonna get Red and Leaf to come
help out too, but...
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_3500_10:
They’ve got their own practice and goals to
work on.
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_3600_10: I can’t hold them back from that.
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_3700_10:
And like I said, I’M the one with a bone to
pick with Giovanni!
story_arceus_07_04000/2401_1001_3900_10:
Chase and Elaine! I wanted to ask you a
favor...
